javancss.title: JavaNCSS+Plugin
javancss.excerpt: This plugin allows you to use JavaNCSS build reporting tool.
javancss.name: javancss

ConfigurationSlicing.title: Configuration Slicing Plugin
ConfigurationSlicing.excerpt: This plugin allows mass configuration of select project properties
ConfigurationSlicing.name: ConfigurationSlicing

changelog-history.title: Change Log History Plugin
changelog-history.excerpt: This plugin copies change log data to a later build when a build is deleted.
changelog-history.name: changelog-history

m2-extra-steps.title: M2 Extra Steps Plugin
m2-extra-steps.excerpt: This plugin provides the ability to add pre- and post-build steps to Maven 2-type projects.
m2-extra-steps.name: m2-extra-steps

platformlabeler.title: PlatformLabeler Plugin
platformlabeler.excerpt: This plugin adds node labels based on the platform the node is running; they are updated each time the node connects.
platformlabeler.name: platformlabeler

SCTMExecutor.title: SCTMExecutor
SCTMExecutor.excerpt: This plugin will let users use Borland's SilkCentral Test Manager 2008 R2 or later.
SCTMExecutor.name: SCTMExecutor

googlecode.title: Google Code Plugin
googlecode.excerpt: This plugin creates links from Hudson projects to Google Code instances.
googlecode.name: googlecode

nunit.title: NUnit Plugin
nunit.excerpt: This plugin allows you publish NUnit test results
nunit.name: nunit

javanet-uploader.title: java.net uploader Plugin
javanet-uploader.excerpt: This plugin uses java.net tasks library to make Hudson capable of posting artifacts to java.net
javanet-uploader.name: javanet-uploader

nabaztag.title: Nabaztag Plugin
nabaztag.excerpt: Allows to publish the result of a build to a Nabaztag.
nabaztag.name: nabaztag

cppcheck.title: Cppcheck Plugin
cppcheck.excerpt: This plugin generates the trend report for CppCheck.
cppcheck.name: cppcheck

ldapemail.title: LDAP Email Plugin
ldapemail.excerpt: This plugin allows you to resolve user email addresses from an LDAP directory.
ldapemail.name: ldapemail

gcal.title: Google Calendar Plugin
gcal.excerpt: This plugin publishes build records over to Google Calendar
gcal.name: gcal

build-timeout.title: Build-timeout Plugin
build-timeout.excerpt: This plugin allows you to automatically abort a build if it's taking too long.
build-timeout.name: build-timeout

phing.title: Phing Plugin
phing.excerpt: This plugin allows you to use Phing to build PHP projects.
phing.name: phing

vmware.title: VMware plugin
vmware.excerpt: This plugin allows you to start a VMware Virtual Machine before a build and stop it again after the build completes.
vmware.name: vmware

bruceschneier.title: BruceSchneier Plugin
bruceschneier.excerpt: Displays a picture of Bruce Schneier (instead of Hudson the butler) and a random Bruce Schneier fact on each build page.
bruceschneier.name: bruceschneier

redmine.title: Redmine Plugin
redmine.excerpt: This plugin integrates Redmine into Hudson (there's a plugin for Redmine that integrates Hudson from the Redmine side, too.)
redmine.name: redmine

campfire.title: Campfire Plugin
campfire.excerpt: This plugin allows your team to setup build notifications to be sent to Campfire rooms.
campfire.name: campfire

svncompat14.title: SVNCompat14 Plugin
svncompat14.excerpt: This plugin forces the built-in SVNKit library to use the Subversion 1.4 working copy format (instead of the most recent one it supports).
svncompat14.name: svncompat14

tasks.title: Task Scanner Plugin
tasks.excerpt: This plugin scans the workspace files for open tasks and generates a trend report.
tasks.name: tasks

greenballs.title: Green Balls
greenballs.excerpt: Changes Hudson to use green balls instead of blue for successful builds
greenballs.name: greenballs

kundo.title: Kundo Plugin
kundo.excerpt: This plugin allows you to invoke Kundo builds as a Hudson build step.
kundo.name: kundo

warnings.title: Warnings Plugin
warnings.excerpt: This plugin generates the trend report for compiler warnings in the console log or in log files.
warnings.name: warnings

emma.title: Emma Plugin
emma.excerpt: This plugin allows you to capture code coverage report from Emma. Hudson will generate the trend report of coverage.
emma.name: emma

pmd.title: PMD Plugin
pmd.excerpt: This plugin generates the trend report for PMD, an open source static code analysis program.
pmd.name: pmd

postbuild-task.title: Post build task
postbuild-task.excerpt: This plugin allows the user to execute a shell/batch task depending on the build log output.Java regular expression are allowed.
postbuild-task.name: postbuild-task

violations.title: Violations
violations.excerpt: This plug-in generates reports static code violation detectors such as checkstyle, pmd, cpd, findbugs, fxcop, stylecop and simian.
violations.name: violations

naginator.title: Naginator Plugin
naginator.excerpt: This plugin allows you to automatically reschedule a build after a build failure.
naginator.name: naginator

vss.title: Visual SourceSafe Plugin
vss.excerpt: This plugin integrates Hudson with Microsoft Visual SourceSafe
vss.name: vss

ftppublisher.title: FTP-Publisher Plugin
ftppublisher.excerpt: This plugin can be used to upload project artifacts and whole directories to an ftp server.
ftppublisher.name: ftppublisher

javanet.title: Java.net Plugin
javanet.excerpt: This plugin extends Hudson for projects hosted on java.net by providing various capabilities
javanet.name: javanet

buckminster.title: Buckminster PlugIn
buckminster.excerpt: This PlugIn integrates Eclipse Buckminster as a new build step into hudson.
buckminster.name: buckminster

serenitec.title: Serenitec Plugin
serenitec.excerpt: Execute the Serenitec refactoring solution on your project
serenitec.name: serenitec

port-allocator.title: Port Allocator Plugin
port-allocator.excerpt: Assigns unique TCP port addresses to jobs so that jobs executed concurrently won't collide with each other. Also performs clean ups to kill off daemons that are forked by jobs.
port-allocator.name: port-allocator

regexemail.title: RegEx Email Plugin
regexemail.excerpt: This plugin allows you to generate user email addresses from usernames.
regexemail.name: regexemail

sloccount.title: SLOCCount Plugin
sloccount.excerpt: This plugin generates the trend report for SLOCCount, an open source program which counts the number of lines of codes in over 25 different languages, including C/C++, Ada, COBOL, Fortran, SQL, Ruby, Python, etc...
sloccount.name: sloccount

mercurial.title: Mercurial Plugin
mercurial.excerpt: This plugin integrates the Mercurial version control system with Hudson.
mercurial.name: mercurial

dry.title: DRY Plugin
dry.excerpt: This plugin generates the trend report for duplicate code checkers like CPD.
dry.name: dry

rubyMetrics.title: Ruby metrics plugin
rubyMetrics.excerpt: This plugin adds to Hudson a bunch of Ruby metric reports( Rcov, Saikuro, Rails stats...).
rubyMetrics.name: rubyMetrics

next-build-number.title: Next Build Number Plugin
next-build-number.excerpt: This is a simple plugin that changes the next build number Hudson will use for a job.
next-build-number.name: next-build-number

build-publisher.title: Build Publisher Plugin
build-publisher.excerpt: This plugin allows records from one Hudson to be published on another Hudson.
build-publisher.name: build-publisher

jmeter.title: JMeter Plugin
jmeter.excerpt: This plugin allows you to capture report from JMeter. Hudson will generate the trend report of performance and robustness.
jmeter.name: jmeter

checkstyle.title: Checkstyle Plugin
checkstyle.excerpt: This plugin generates the trend report for Checkstyle, an open source static code analysis program.
checkstyle.name: checkstyle

text-finder.title: Text-finder Plugin
text-finder.excerpt: This plugin lets you search keywords in the files you specified and use that to mark the build as success or a failure.
text-finder.name: text-finder

dbCharts.title: dbCharts Plugin
dbCharts.excerpt: Add charts based on JDBC database data series to the hudson.
dbCharts.name: dbCharts

tfs.title: Team Foundation Server Plugin
tfs.excerpt: This plugin integrates Microsoft Team Foundation Server source control to Hudson.
tfs.name: tfs

secret.title: Build Secret Plugin
secret.excerpt: Lets you upload secret files to be used by a build.
secret.name: secret

dependencyanalyzer.title: Dependency Analyzer Plugin
dependencyanalyzer.excerpt: This plugin parses dependency:analyze goal from maven build logs and generate a dependency report
dependencyanalyzer.name: dependencyanalyzer

jsunit.title: JSUnit plugin
jsunit.excerpt: This plugin allows you publish JSUnit test results
jsunit.name: jsunit

googleanalytics.title: Google Analytics Plugin
googleanalytics.excerpt: This plugin decorates all web pages with the Google Analytics tracking script
googleanalytics.name: googleanalytics

grails.title: Grails Plugin
grails.excerpt: This plugin allows Hudson to invoke Grails tasks as build steps.
grails.name: grails

hgca.title: HGCA+Plugin
hgca.excerpt: This plugin allows the administrator to specify pairs of patterns and URLs, both globally and on a per-job level, to use for marking up changelog text.
hgca.name: hgca

statusmonitor.title: Status Monitor Plugin
statusmonitor.excerpt: This plugin shows the state of selected jobs visually on a single screen.
statusmonitor.name: statusmonitor

perforce.title: Perforce Plugin
perforce.excerpt: Integrates Hudson with Perforce SCM Repositories.
perforce.name: perforce

msbuild.title: MSBuild Plugin
msbuild.excerpt: This plugin allows you to use MSBuild to build .NET projects.
msbuild.name: msbuild

plot.title: Plot Plugin
plot.excerpt: This plugin provides generic plotting (or graphing) capabilities in Hudson.
plot.name: plot

ci-game.title: The Continuous Integration Game plugin
ci-game.excerpt: This plugin introduces a game where users gets point on improving the builds.
ci-game.name: ci-game

japex.title: Japex Plugin
japex.excerpt: This plugin adds Japex support for Hudson so that Hudson can display trend reports and other useful metrics.
japex.name: japex

swarm.title: Swarm Plugin
swarm.excerpt: This plugin enables slaves to auto-discover nearby Hudson master and join it automatically, thereby forming an ad-hoc cluster.
swarm.name: swarm

pvcs_scm.title: PVCS SCM
pvcs_scm.excerpt: This plugin provides integration with Serena's PVCS Version Manager SCM.
pvcs_scm.name: pvcs_scm

selenium-aes.title: Selenium AES Plugin
selenium-aes.excerpt: This plugin is call Selenium Auto Exec Server(AES) for test.
selenium-aes.name: selenium-aes

ncover.title: NCover Plugin
ncover.excerpt: Archive and publish .NET code coverage HTML reports from NCover
ncover.name: ncover

locked-files-report.title: Locked Files Report Plugin
locked-files-report.excerpt: This debug plugin fails a build if there are locked files in the workspace at the begining or end of a build.
locked-files-report.name: locked-files-report

backup.title: Backup Plugin
backup.excerpt: Backup plugin permits to archive and restore your hudson home directory.
backup.name: backup

svn-release-mgr.title: Subversion Release Manager
svn-release-mgr.excerpt: This plugin allows you to set up a job in Hudson for building specific revisions of a project.
svn-release-mgr.name: svn-release-mgr

release.title: Release Plugin
release.excerpt: This plugin adds the ability to wrap your job with pre\- and post\- build steps which are only executed when a manual release build is triggered.
release.name: release

xfpanel.title: eXtreme Feedback Panel Plugin
xfpanel.excerpt: This plugin provides an eXtreme Feedback Panel that can be used to expose the status of a selected number of Jobs.
xfpanel.name: xfpanel

jira.title: JIRA Plugin
jira.excerpt: This plugin integrates Atlassian JIRA to Hudson.
jira.name: jira

scp.title: SCP plugin
scp.excerpt: This plugin allows you  upload some build artifacts to the repository sites using SFTP (SSH) protocol.
scp.name: scp

join.title: Join Plugin
join.excerpt: This plugin allows a job to be run after all the immediate downstream jobs have completed.
join.name: join

claim.title: Claim plugin
claim.excerpt: This plugin allows users to claim failed builds
claim.name: claim

selenium.title: Selenium Plugin
selenium.excerpt: This plugin turns your Hudson cluster into a Selenium Grid cluster
selenium.name: selenium

email-ext.title: Email-ext plugin
email-ext.excerpt: This plugin allows you to configure every aspect of email notifications.  You can customize when an email is sent, who should receive it, and what the email says.
email-ext.name: email-ext

cvs-tag.title: CVS Tagging Plugin
cvs-tag.excerpt: This plugin will perform cvs tagging (specifically cvs rtag) after a job has been built successfully.
cvs-tag.name: cvs-tag

twitter.title: Twitter Plugin
twitter.excerpt: This plugin posts build results to Twitter.
twitter.name: twitter

cppunit.title: CppUnit Plugin
cppunit.excerpt: This plugin allows you publish CppUnit test results.
cppunit.name: cppunit

zentimestamp.title: ZenTimestamp Plugin
zentimestamp.excerpt: This plugin allows the customization of the date and time pattern for the Hudson BUILD_ID variable.
zentimestamp.name: zentimestamp

batch-task.title: Batch Task Plugin
batch-task.excerpt: This plugin adds batch tasks that are not regularly executed to projects, such as releases, integration, archiving, etc.
batch-task.name: batch-task

sectioned-view.title: Sectioned View Plugin
sectioned-view.excerpt: This plugin provides a new view implementation that can be divided into sections. Each section can display different information about the selected jobs.  An extension point is also provided to define new types of sections.
sectioned-view.name: sectioned-view

testabilityexplorer.title: Testability Explorer Plugin
testabilityexplorer.excerpt: This plugin generates trend reports for the Testability Explorer, an open source program which uses byte-code analysis to look for testability pitfalls in Java code.
testabilityexplorer.name: testabilityexplorer

tuxdroid.title: TuxDroid Plugin
tuxdroid.excerpt: Allows to publish the result of a build to a TuxDroid.
tuxdroid.name: tuxdroid

description-setter.title: Description Setter Plugin
description-setter.excerpt: This plugin sets the description for each build, based upon a RegEx test of the build log file.
description-setter.name: description-setter

doxygen.title: Doxygen Plugin
doxygen.excerpt: This plugin publishes the reports generated by the Doxygen tool.
doxygen.name: doxygen

htmlpublisher.title: FTP-Publisher Plugin
htmlpublisher.excerpt: This plugin can be used to upload project artifacts and whole directories to an ftp server.
htmlpublisher.name: htmlpublisher

ec2.title: Amazon EC2 Plugin
ec2.excerpt: Allow Hudson to start slaves on EC2 on demand, and kill them as they get unused.
ec2.name: ec2

grinder.title: Grinder Plugin
grinder.excerpt: This plugin reads output result files from Grinder performance tests, and will generate reports showing test results for every build and trend reports showing performance results across builds.
grinder.name: grinder

promoted-builds-simple.title: Promoted Builds Simple Plugin
promoted-builds-simple.excerpt: Simpler version of [Promoted Builds Plugin], with only manual promotion of builds.
promoted-builds-simple.name: promoted-builds-simple

polarion.title: Polarion Plugin
polarion.excerpt: This plugin integrates the WebClient for SVN, an open source, web based interface to Subversion provided by Polarion.
polarion.name: polarion

github.title: Github Plugin
github.excerpt: This plugin creates links from Hudson to Github projects.
github.name: github

gallio.title: Gallio Plugin
gallio.excerpt: This plugin allows you publish Gallio/MbUnit test results
gallio.name: gallio

versionnumber.title: Version Number Plugin
versionnumber.excerpt: This plugin creates a new version number and stores it in the environment variable whose name you specify in the configuration.
versionnumber.name: versionnumber

groovy.title: Groovy plugin
groovy.excerpt: This plugin adds the ability to directly execute Groovy code.
groovy.name: groovy

sonar.title: Sonar plugin
sonar.excerpt: Quickly benefit from Sonar, an open-source Code Quality Management Platform based on many well known analysis tools like Checkstyle, PMD, Findbugs, Cobertura, ....
sonar.name: sonar

trac.title: Trac Plugin
trac.excerpt: This plugin creates links from Hudson projects to Trac instances.
trac.name: trac

gradle.title: Gradle Plugin
gradle.excerpt: This plugin allows Hudson to invoke Gradle build script as the main build step.
gradle.name: gradle

distfork.title: DistFork Plugin
distfork.excerpt: Turns a Hudson cluster into a general purpose batch job execution environment through an SSH-like CLI.
distfork.name: distfork

ivy.title: Ivy Plugin
ivy.excerpt: This plugin automatically configures a build to trigger other builds based on dependency configuration via Apache Ivy.
ivy.name: ivy

pxe.title: PXE Plugin
pxe.excerpt: This plugin enhances Hudson to support network-booting PCs for rapid, hands-free installations of various OSes, thereby making new slave installations easier.
pxe.name: pxe

m2release.title: M2 Release Plugin
m2release.excerpt: This plugin allows you to perform a release build using the maven-release-plugin from within Hudson.
m2release.name: m2release

accurev.title: Accurev Plugin
accurev.excerpt: This plugin allows you to use AccuRev as a SCM.
accurev.name: accurev

jswidgets.title: JSWidgets Plugin
jswidgets.excerpt: Allows embedding various statistics available from Hudson in your via javascript-snippets ala ohloh.net.
jswidgets.name: jswidgets

mstest.title: MSTest Plugin
mstest.excerpt: This plugin allows you publish MSTest test results
mstest.name: mstest

promoted-builds.title: Promoted Builds Plugin
promoted-builds.excerpt: This plugin allows you to distinguish good builds from bad builds by introducing the notion of 'promotion'.
promoted-builds.name: promoted-builds

xunit.title: xUnit Plugin
xunit.excerpt: This plugin allows you to publish testing tools test result report.
xunit.name: xunit

copy-to-slave.title: Copy To Slave Plugin
copy-to-slave.excerpt: This plugin allows to copy, to slave nodes running a job, a set of files that are required for the good execution of the job.
copy-to-slave.name: copy-to-slave

cccc.title: CCCC Plugin
cccc.excerpt: This plugin generates the trend report for CCCC(C and C+\+ Code Counter).
cccc.name: cccc

setenv.title: Setenv Plugin
setenv.excerpt: Set environment variables for a project, to be referenced during build steps.
setenv.name: setenv

bazaar.title: Bazaar Plugin
bazaar.excerpt: This plugin integrates Bazaar version control system to Hudson. The plugin requires the Bazaar binary (bzr) to be installed on the target machine.
bazaar.name: bazaar

locks-and-latches.title: Locks and Latches plugin
locks-and-latches.excerpt: This plugin allows you to control the parallel execution of jobs.
locks-and-latches.name: locks-and-latches

javatest-report.title: JavaTest Report Plugin
javatest-report.excerpt: This plugin enables Hudson to load test output from JavaTest test harness, which is commonly used by TCK tests for various JSRs.
javatest-report.name: javatest-report

hadoop.title: Hadoop Plugin
hadoop.excerpt: This plugin makes Hudson cluster act as a Hadoop cluster without any configuration.
hadoop.name: hadoop

nant.title: NAnt Plugin
nant.excerpt: This plugin allows you to build .NET projects using NAnt.
nant.name: nant

validating-string-parameter.title: Validating String Parameter Plugin
validating-string-parameter.excerpt: The validating string parameter plugin contributes a new parameter type to Hudson that supports regular expression validation of the user's entered parameter.
validating-string-parameter.name: validating-string-parameter

mantis.title: Mantis Plugin
mantis.excerpt: This plugin integrates Mantis Bug Tracker to Hudson.
mantis.name: mantis

ssh-slaves.title: SSH Slaves plugin
ssh-slaves.excerpt: This plugin allows you to manage slaves running on \*nix machines over SSH.
ssh-slaves.name: ssh-slaves

crap4j.title: Crap4J Plugin
crap4j.excerpt: This plugin reads the "crappy methods" report from Crap4J. Hudson will generate the trend report of crap percentage and provide detailed information about changes.
crap4j.name: crap4j

blame-upstream-commiters.title: Blame Upstream Commiters Plugin
blame-upstream-commiters.excerpt: This is a very simple plugin that adds a post build action to mail upstream commiters when a build fails.
blame-upstream-commiters.name: blame-upstream-commiters

sidebar-link.title: Sidebar-Link Plugin
sidebar-link.excerpt: Add links in the sidebar of the Hudson main page and view tabs.
sidebar-link.name: sidebar-link

svn-tag.title: Subversion Tagging Plugin
svn-tag.excerpt: This plugin performs subversion tagging (technically speaking svn copy) on successful build.
svn-tag.name: svn-tag

locale.title: Locale Plugin
locale.excerpt: This plugin controls the language of Hudson
locale.name: locale

radiatorviewplugin.title: Radiator View Plugin
radiatorviewplugin.excerpt: Provides a new View implementation displaying project status in a highly visible manner. This is ideal for displaying on a screen on the office wall as a form of Extreme Feedback Device.
radiatorviewplugin.name: radiatorviewplugin

url-change-trigger.title: URL Change Trigger
url-change-trigger.excerpt: The URL Change Trigger plugin allows you to trigger a Hudson build when the content of a URL changes.
url-change-trigger.name: url-change-trigger

ircbot.title: IRC Plugin
ircbot.excerpt: This plugin installs Hudson IRC bot on your choice of IRC channels. You can get notifications via IRC and interact with Hudson via IRC.
ircbot.name: ircbot

slave-status.title: slave-status
slave-status.excerpt: Monitor the status of Hudson slaves.
slave-status.name: slave-status

doclinks.title: DocLinks Plugin
doclinks.excerpt: This plugin allows you to publish your documents that are created in the build steps.
doclinks.name: doclinks

svncompat13.title: SVNCompat14 Plugin
svncompat13.excerpt: This plugin forces the built-in SVNKit library to use the Subversion 1.4 working copy format (instead of the most recent one it supports).
svncompat13.name: svncompat13

deploy.title: Deploy Plugin
deploy.excerpt: This plugin takes a war/ear file and deploys that to a running remote application server at the end of a build
deploy.name: deploy

jython.title: Jython Plugin
jython.excerpt: Adds the ability to execute Jython script from within the JVM
jython.name: jython

synergy.title: Synergy Plugin
synergy.excerpt: This plugin provide integrations with CM/Synergy Version Manager SCM
synergy.name: synergy

script-realm.title: Script Security Realm
script-realm.excerpt: This plugin allows you to use a user-written custom script to authenticate the username and password
script-realm.name: script-realm

easyant.title: EasyAnt Plugin
easyant.excerpt: This plugin allows Hudson to invoke EasyAnt build script as the main build step.
easyant.name: easyant

chucknorris.title: ChuckNorris Plugin
chucknorris.excerpt: Displays a picture of Chuck Norris (instead of Hudson the butler) and a random Chuck Norris 'The Programmer' fact on each build page.
chucknorris.name: chucknorris

template-project.title: Template Project Plugin
template-project.excerpt: This plugin lets you use builders, publishers and SCM settings from another project.
template-project.name: template-project

gnat.title: Gnat Plugin
gnat.excerpt: This plugin allows Hudson to integrate Gnat features for ADA languages.
gnat.name: gnat

harvest.title: Harvest Plugin
harvest.excerpt: This plugin allows you to use CA Harvest as a SCM.
harvest.name: harvest

backlog.title: Backlog Plugin
backlog.excerpt: This plugin integrates Backlog to Hudson.
backlog.name: backlog

translation.title: Translation Assistance Plugin
translation.excerpt: This plugin adds an additional dialog box in every page, which enables people to contribute localizations for the messages they are seeing in the current page.
translation.name: translation

cygpath.title: Cygpath Plugin
cygpath.excerpt: This plugin performs Cygwin path conversion before forking new processes
cygpath.name: cygpath

findbugs.title: FindBugs Plugin
findbugs.excerpt: This plugin generates the trend report for FindBugs, an open source program which uses static analysis to look for bugs in Java code.
findbugs.name: findbugs

active-directory.title: Active Directory plugin
active-directory.excerpt: With this plugin, you can configure Hudson authenticates the username and the password through Active Directory.
active-directory.name: active-directory

scons.title: SCons Plugin
scons.excerpt: This plugin allows Hudson to invoke SCons build script as the main build step.
scons.name: scons

sfee.title: SFEE Plugin
sfee.excerpt: Authenticate users and publish build artifacts reling on a Collabnet Source Forge Enterprise Edition (SFEE) server
sfee.name: sfee

rake.title: Rake plugin
rake.excerpt: This plugin allows Hudson to invoke Rake tasks as build steps.
rake.name: rake

URLSCM.title: URL SCM
URLSCM.excerpt: This plugin allows the use of URLs as an SCM plugin
URLSCM.name: URLSCM

sametime.title: SameTime Plugin
sametime.excerpt: This plugin allows you to use SameTime as build notifier.
sametime.name: sametime

python.title: Python Plugin
python.excerpt: Adds the ability to execute python scripts as build steps
python.name: python

subversion.title: Subversion Plugin
subversion.excerpt: This plugin adds the Subversion support (via SVNKit) to Hudson.
subversion.name: subversion

audit-trail.title: Audit Trail Plugin
audit-trail.excerpt: Keep a log of who performed particular Hudson operations, such as configuring jobs.
audit-trail.name: audit-trail

gant.title: Gant Plugin
gant.excerpt: This plugin allows Hudson to invoke Gant build script as the main build step.
gant.name: gant

emotional-hudson.title: Emotional Hudson Plugin
emotional-hudson.excerpt: This funny plugin changes the expression of Mr.Hudson in the background when your builds fail.
emotional-hudson.name: emotional-hudson
